ray.rage.common

Interface Visible

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Camera, Entity, Light, ManualObject, RenderWindow, SceneObject, SkeletalEntity, SkyBox, Tessellation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGenericSceneObject, GenericCamera, GenericEntity, GenericLight, GenericManualObject, GenericSkeletalEntity, GenericSkyBox, GenericTessellation, GL4RenderWindow

    public interface Visible
    A visible object is one that can be displayed in some way, such as an object in a scene.
    Author:
    Raymond L. Rivera

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isVisible()
      Returns true if this is currently visible.
      void setVisible(boolean visible)
      Set to true if this should be visible.

    • Method Detail

      • setVisible

        void setVisible(boolean visible)
        Set to true if this should be visible. Otherwise false.

      • isVisible

        boolean isVisible()
        Returns true if this is currently visible. Otherwise false.
